name: swooningly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows feelings of pleasure, love, etc.: The article swooningly describes his "limpid green eyes" and "intense" good looks. She writes swooningly about love of all kinds.
More examplesFewer examplesThe dreamlike quality of this swooningly romantic story is enhanced by the hand-held camerawork.The novel's swooningly beautiful prose attracted a huge international readership.His eyebrows were raised and his lip seductively curled as he played a swooningly expressive melody.This swooningly historic country house hotel is set in 2,000 acres of rolling parkland.
